messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] writing it down (was dear abby)
messages.msgSnippet: Bedtime is when I am exhusted. Kids are still going, but I usually have read til I am falling asleep. Maybe if I were to gather them as if I were going to read
messages.messageBody:
Bedtime is when I am exhusted. Kids are still going, but I usually have read
til I am falling asleep. Maybe if I were to gather them as if I were going to
read and have their input for the journal for a few minutes! That might work!
I miss those nursing baby moments, when everything else was put on hold!
Hugs, Patti


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] writing it down (was dear abby)
messages.msgSnippet: gersonkid4@aol.com writes:  Try writing it every nite before bed, like a journal entry.  I did that for a
messages.messageBody:
gersonkid4@... writes:

<< The writing
it down is my problem!!
Hugs, Patti >>

Try writing it every nite before bed, like a journal entry. I did that for a
while, just 'cause. Alex likes reading it, even tho I gave up on it long
ago.

~Aimee
